text: awlyk hum aladhin khatam allah ealaa qulubuhum bialkufr w'iythar aldunya ealaa alakhrt, fala yasil 'iilayha nur alhdayt, wasm sameuhum ean ayat allah fala ysmewnha smae tdbbur, waema absarhm, fala yarawn albrahyn aldalt ealaa alwhyt allh, wawlyk hum alghafilun emma aedd allah lahum min aledhab
